name: Grand Bahia Principe Punta Cana

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This has been the best vacation my wife and I have experienced thus far. We have never felt so relaxed and so pampered. The management team has done an exceptional job on training their employees on all levels on how to run a successful resort. There were approx 7,000 guests while we were there and they still managed to keep this place spotless. I have never walked into a public rest room on the beach and experienced such cleanliness as i did at this resort.This is hands down a 1st class resort all the way.
reviews.title: Awesome Vacation

reviews.text: I am from Dominican Republic, thsi was my first time visit Punta cana, i know the all Bahia principe are excellent, but that one just is out of standing , the room clean neat, all update, they have super staff , helpfull and enthusiastic, they have 5 star show every single night, everybody can participate and enjoy plus the boot are very helpfull spcially one name Cirilo i can remenber his last name , but is not one there with this name, y want to thanks belki one of watre ,The beach is beautiful and clean the boots are very helpful especially one named Cyril I do not remember his last name but I also know that there is no trunk there with that name, 100% recommend the hotel one of the waitresses in the restaurant, Carlos bartender to make feel my son so special thanks all.........
reviews.title: Our amaizing chritsmas vacation

reviews.text: We had a wonderful family vacation at Gran Bahia Principe. (My husband, myself, daughters 8&11 and my father in law). We booked with transat vacations. Our room was in the Royal Golden Section exclusive to Transat. I would definitely recommend the royal golden because the rooms are closest to the beach. The resort is large but once you get the lay of the land it is so easy to get around. If you don't feel like walking there are golf carts available on a continual basis. We never had to wait for more than a few minutes.
reviews.title: Wonderful holiday! Terrific resort!

reviews.text: Resort Grounds - gorgeous gardens, very clean surroundings, nicely laid out
reviews.title: great hotel!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Lobby - beautiful, very nice bar staff, fun to sit and relax day or night. Ask for a plate of peanuts if you would like a little snack with your drink. Good drinks, nicely decorated. Great cappuccino and cafe latte.
reviews.title: Amazing Vacation

reviews.text: We spent a full week at this hotel and had a great time. Any deficiencies that I can think of are few, far between and so minor as to be not worth repeating. The staff were friendly and as helpful as communications allowed. The service was excellent everywhere in the resort, which is very large. We stayed in building 14, which is half-way between the lobby and the beach. Both are an easy walk of 3-4 minutes or you can take the shuttle bus which runs frequently. There are two swimming pools with bars located adjacent to building 14, so we had an alternative to the beach for a quick drink and dip. Our room was cleaned and fresh towels and bottled water were provided daily. The mini-bar was always kept full. In addition the buffet located by the lobby, there is the Pisces snack bar located at two more swimming pools with bars at the beach. You should know that the snack bar is actually a buffet with lots of variety. Over the course of our stay we ate at both these buffets, as well as several of the restaurants included in our package. The food and service was excellent and friendly.
reviews.title: Great Time Feb 21 -28, 2013

reviews.text: We really can't say enough about the friendly service we received. Everybody from the groundskeepers to maid service to waiters to reception were courteous, friendly and helpful. If they weren't solving your problem they were offering a coffee, cerveza, food or an "hola".
reviews.title: Great relaxing Vacation

reviews.text: We would recommend this hotel and would go back again.
reviews.title: Nice place for families or couples

reviews.text: Had a great visit!! Nice clean rooms and beach! Friendly staff! Good times! :) I have no complaints! The Michael Jackson show was out of this world!!! The only thing I didnt like was the miss gran bihia pageant .. I found that it sensationalized violence toward women.. So i just didnt attend that show
reviews.title: The good and Not so good

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed a week at this resort in the golden area nearer to the beach. The place is huge so be prepared to walk to the front buildings for entertainment and main lobby bars. Very nice clean rooms, hard working service staff, and the food is great. Excellent beach with plenty of chairs. The nightly shows are very good in the main auditorium and at the market place stage.
reviews.title: review gran bahia

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: where do I start? we got lost on our first nite at the resort and it seemed as though the staff who drove the little trolleys or buses all over the resort had no idea where they were going. We even had a map and would show them where we wanted to go and it took us 1and a half hours to find our room and in the meantime we tried to laugh it off and they were quite ignorant. After a week and a half on our vacation we met up with some people who had been to a bahia principe resort before so they were telling us about the rewards of being a repeat customer.This was also our second year in a row at bahia principe resort. anyway these people were given a beautiful fruit basket, upgraded to a different room closer to the beach, a bottle of rum in their room and t-shirts, as well as late checkout, free internet use as well as being able to go to pretty much any restaurant and pool on the resort with a certain bracelet.. Once we found this out we went to customer service to inquire as we had already paid 45.00 on internet at the internet cafe(which we hoped we could get reimbursed for as they were supposed to have asked us when we checked in if we had ever been to their resorts before), and we figured we should get what we were entitled to . They did agree that we should get this stuff but it took the whole four days that we had left to get what we were supposed to and it was a fight to get it. We got a 125 ml bottle of rum(which is cheaper than water there), 2 t-shirts that were stretched out of shape and would not have fit a 5 year old yet they were supposedly an extra large,(garbage t-shirts for a high end resort like this) , our fruit basket was a plate with 2 brown bananas, an apple, a lime as hard as a baseball, and an orange that had no juice in it at all,(disgusting, we did not even touch any of it) We had some other problems with our keys and being locked out of our room ,someone in our room when they should not have been, trouble with our excursion people on the resort,(our signature reps ,who are supposedly there to help you when you have problems.) Any time they saw us coming they would give us dirty looks and not be helpful or friendly at all and would make us feel as though we were wasting their time to the point of being very uncomfortable around them. After all these problems we were promised (as some kind of retribution or favor)that on our day of departure ; we could have a late checkout.Even though we were promised that about 4 times at least from different people that we talked to ; on the day we were to leave we got locked out of our room and had to run around trying to get back in at the last minute to round up our things. All these hassles put a bad taste in our mouths. We spent alot of money to go there and this was how we got treated. I have since tried to write to them and contact them and they take no responsibility. We had stayed in the same resort in the Mayan Riviera and were very happy with the staff and how friendly they were. We will not go back to this resort again after this treatment.
reviews.title: Beautiful grounds and resort, but the employees need help in friendliness

reviews.text: Wonderful !! Amazing trip, restaurants and buffet food was OK, beautiful beach !
reviews.title: Great 1st trip to the caribbean !!

reviews.text: ok i'm a little late for writing my review... i went to that hotel last october with my mom and brother and went in july 2008 as well ... i seriously don't get tired of this hotel ... for the price it's excellent ... its a huge property itself with shuttle transportation that takes you around ... there is 3 different sections .. Ambar for adults only .. Bavaro sold with some companies mostly europeans.. and Punta Cana the main one ... great for people who love walking ... you even have a small village with the casino .. disco .. live entertainment .. shops ...
reviews.title: I WENT TWICE AND WILL GO BACK

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The shows at night are really good and professional .. go see the Michael Jackson one !! he looks just like him lol ... there is so many variety of restaurants .. my suggestions .. is the garden grill (steak house )..Japanese restaurant and the Gourmet ( if you like french food )
reviews.title: ORGANIZED FRAUD - BE VERY CAREFUL!!!!

reviews.text: It's super clean .. i mean spotless ! always people working on the grounds from morning till evening to make sure everything looks great ...
reviews.title: Excellent place and a great value too
Robbed at Gran Bahia, Punta Cana
reviews.text: Please be very careful at this resort.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: While getting ready to do a room change from the bottom floor to a second level we left the room (Villa 5106) for 1 hour to go to the lobby. My purse was opened and my credit card, drivers licence and birth certificate were all stolen. Thank Godness my husband had the passports with him at all times.
reviews.title: Absolutely georgeous and amazing! Please read!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The credit card was used and a total of $3,500.00 was charged. I now have the incovienience of trying to recover those costs. Also I must replace my identity cards at a cost.
reviews.title: Beautiful Resort, with some quirks

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel itself was beautuful as far as service and cleanliness. I have traveld to many Gran Bahia resorts (Mexico. Puerta Plata and Jamacia) and have NEVER had this happen. I feel very violated and angry.
reviews.title: Poor service, DO NOT BOOK A WEDDING HERE

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have written to the travel agency to warn other travelers and the management at this particular resort and I hope to hear back from them that they have conducted a investigation
reviews.title: AMAZING VACATION!!! Please Read!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed at the Grand Bahia Principe Bavaro during the second week of April. A beautiful and extremely well maintained resort. This is my fourth and our third trip to Punta Cana and the fourth different resort and this was by far the most beautiful one. The food was your regular all-inclusive fare save for the Garden Grill which was exceptional! The beach was gorgeous ,almost sea-weed free. The usual 6 AM people out there reserving every lounger under a sun shade by the pools or on the beach ( gets a little more annoying year after year). But we weren't there for the shade anyways.
reviews.title: Wonderful Resort but....

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The disco was the busiest I've ever seen at a resort and the kareoke bar was a ton of fun. The nightly shows were okay but the Circus show was great.
reviews.title: So beautiful!!!!! This property is big but never boring!!!

reviews.text: All in all ,we had a great time at this resort . now comes the "but" . If there is one downside to this resort it is that there are far too many Quebecers. It's a good thing that they don't consider themselves Canadian because ,being one myself, I would not want to be associated with them. They are the most rude and demanding complainers!!
reviews.title: Somewhat relaxing

reviews.text: Still, I would recommend this resort . The plus's outnumber the minus's.
reviews.title: Beautiful beach & location, but extremely loud & busy resort

reviews.text: My boyfriend and I stayed here for 2 weeks. We stayed at the Esmeralda section of this resort and was certainly not disapointed, a great place to have a wonderful vacation!!! The staff were so happy and friendly... The grounds here are Breath-taking for sure, kind of spoils you,true eye candy. Alexander our waiter.....hola !!!! you are the best buddy!!! Big resort but truly entertaining for sure.... Jump on the tram ,go for a ride around the different areas of the property then jump off when you see something that interests you "believe me theres lots"! The Beach...You got to see the beach!!!! The Esmeralda is the closest to the beach which makes it perfect.....Have a Wonderful vacation!!!!
reviews.title: what a great vacation

reviews.text: Mini bar has a few sodas, water and two beer a day only, my room was musty smelling, ceiling in bathroom was leaking, bathtub no user friendly if you have short legs or bad knees, no shower curtain or door just half a pain of glass. Someone in same complex slipped and fell very slippery. Friday night venders set up on main walkway to restaurant and theatre very aggressive but could not avoid them. restaurant staff and bar staff very professional, Music at pool area the same over and over again bad sound system. Thank goodness i like my families company. :) Asked for needle and thread for room three times ...never came. need to tip all the time so not really all inclusive.food meu did not change much...a la cartes where good...Japenese mediocre but good for first timers.
reviews.title: gran bahia principe Punta cana not what i was expecting
Nice vacation too big for singles
reviews.text: Enjoyed the stay. Nice resort, food was good. Overall 3 stars.
Just sharing from someone who travels a lot...
reviews.title: Great time! Spring Break for mommy and daddy

reviews.text: Too big. Can't get to meet folks when theirs ever 4000 guest ...
reviews.title: PARADISE!

reviews.text: Beach...way to many people...very disappointed. Couldn't find a spot to relax!
reviews.title: First time to the Dominican

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just returned home from the Gran Bahia Principe Punta Cana and had a fabulous trip. We stayed in the Royal Golden section this time which is closest to the beach. This was our third time to this resort over the years and it remains to be wonderful. Our previous times were on the Bavaro section. We were literally 5 steps to the main pool, the beach, the beach buffet (which serves as an a la carte in the evening and later a late night munchie area) as well as 5 steps to their resort "people mover" trollies. We were in number 20 room 106.
reviews.title: Excellent time at the Gran Bahia Principe Punta Cana Royal Golden

reviews.text: That being said, you do not need to stay in Royal Golden at this resort. We just happened to get the Royal Golden package for the same price as the regular package price, so we took it. This resort is beautiful, well laid out, easy to manuver, and well landscaped. There are 4 sections to this property yet it does not give you a sense of being too big. Everything is easy to get to without a lot of walking. They have managed to supply enough loungers at the pools and at the beach that within 5 minutes of looking you can find a place to lay your towel without having to get up early to do so. The resort itself is laid out in a way that the trollies stop within a short walk of where ever you need to be.
reviews.title: Gran Bahia Principe Royal Golden Punta Cana

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Everything is very clean on the whole property, the staff work very hard keeping it this way and do a fabulous job. The food is wonderful, from the buffets to the a la cartes, and the snacks. Everything was well cooked, cold if it should be, hot if it should be too. We ate at the Spanish a la carte one evening, ordered the Beef Florentine, asked for the steak to be well done, when it came you could literally cut it with a butter knife, that's how tender it was. The waiters do a fabulous job with the tables, very prompt and polite. We also ate at the Italian, American Grill, and the beach BBQ. All were very good, though the beach BBQ was more buffet than a la carte.
reviews.title: Enjoy

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: All bartenders are wonderful as well, and are very fast serving the people, especially at the pool areas. Drinks are made to order and they never forgot what you like to drink when they saw your face. If you are at pool #4 look for Hugo and Miquel, they made our 8 day stay awesome. I looked forward everyday to seeing them. The entertainment staff on the resort, around the pool area, was great as well, always a laugh there. The nightly entertainment was good too, same as most resorts, but well done. This resort property offers two venues though, one at the theatre and one at the open air square afterwards. Then on to the disco if you like.
reviews.title: Beautiful resort

reviews.text: We did not do any excursions this time as we just wanted to relax and unwind. On past trips to Punta Cana we did the Outback Safari, the Saona Island catamaran tour, Marinarium tour, and their zipline tour. I would highly recommend all of these to those who have not done them. If you are looking for good Larimar jewelry for a decent price, look for Alexes on the beach. He works with the GBP resort, will have their beige property shirt on, with his name on it. He will have a tray, with the items on it, and they are nice, and he does not pressure you to buy.
reviews.title: Breathtaking

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We enjoyed this resort very much. Its huge so a bit confusing the first day, but after that it was fine. All the staff were great and our rooms were clean and comfortable. There is only one snack bar open at night which was a long walk from our room, so that was a downfall, but other than that no complaints! The pools are nice with great swim up bars and awesome drinks! The shows at night were hilarious and we had a blast!
reviews.title: Grand Bahia Prinicipe Punta Cana - Great resort, wonderful trip!!

reviews.text: First let me say that this was my first all-inclusive. I was not sure what to expect, so I was not disappointed. Overall, I had a very relaxing week and did not get board. Here are my notes made over a one week stay in August:
reviews.title: A lot to say about Principe

reviews.text: Beautiful grounds, pools, and lobby.
reviews.title: Excellent vacation!!

reviews.text: Beach vendors were not oppressive.
reviews.title: Wonderful Resort, Great Vacation

reviews.text: Free non-motorized water sports, but most popular activities must be reserved.
reviews.title: Great Vacation

reviews.text: This is a mega resort, its huge and there are actually 4 different resorts in one.
reviews.title: Great Mega All Inclusive Resort

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have done many all inclusives and this is one of the best ones we have done in Dominican Republic. The grounds are beautiful, the rooms are a good size, the food is good, the staff, well some of them need a lesson in customer service but overall it was fine. I did find the servers in the main buffet were the least attentive and didn't seem to care much. I have never found that before at resorts before but maybe its because of the size of this place. The beach was beautiful, there are numerous pools and they all have their positives and negatives but there is something for everyone. Some of the restaurants were good, others not so much. There is a tram that takes you around the resorts but really, you can walk it, its great exercise and the people that get all angry that they missed the tram or the tram wasn't coming, if they had walked, they would have been there already.
reviews.title: Bahia Principe Punta Cana

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked our trip as 'Royal Golden' and we were ushered to a designated, air conditioned, check-in room. We were offered welcome drinks and the check-in process was completed in about 10 minutes. The bellboy transported us and our luggage to our room which was very clean and quite spacious. It had a king size bed that was very comfortable which we have noted is not the norm for many resorts. A mini fridge was stocked with drinking water, several types of soda pop and, of course, beer.
reviews.title: Wonderful Honeymoon Destination

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As others have stated, this resort is HUGE. There are three main transport routes and once you get to know where you are and where you need to go, the transportation setup functions well and you rarely have a long wait to get transport to where your destination.
reviews.title: Best of the Best
Great customer service made the trip
reviews.text: The food in the buffets are quite good with a fair variety of items to choose from. Thursday was seafood night and an ample supply of lobster was on hand. The menu does repeat weekly so, If you are there for two weeks, you will see the same selections twice. I liked the fact that they gave you a little 'squirt' of hand sanitizer upon entry to the buffet and snack bars.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We got back yesterday. A very nice resort. There are a number of hotels on this property. We stayed at the "Royal Golden" booked through Itravel2000~ I am still very confused about their quality "tiers" so consult your travel agent for specifics before you go. Ours gave us some incorrect info.
reviews.title: Would recommend - very nice resort. Service is great.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were in Villa 20 so we were right on the largest pool, one of the closest to the beach and Olas (one of the main snack bars). It was a beautiful room with a view of the ocean from the balcony.
reviews.title: a dream come true.amazing place

reviews.text: Ambar is the Adults only resort and also has villas right near the beach. Esmeralda is about 6 months old and apperently has awesome rooms and also has villas near the beach.
reviews.title: Great Vacationn !!! :) Golden Section

reviews.text: This resort is HUGE, I believe our rep said up to 3000 guests. In the past we've met other couples and hung out with them throughout our trip. This trip we would meet people once and never see them again... not an intimate resort. Would be great if you're not a big socializer or are travelling with a large group of friends.
reviews.title: Time of My Life

reviews.text: They have trolleys that take you to and from the main lobby, restaurants and other pools. This system is very efficent and quick. The walk from the beach to the lobby was about 7 minutes.
reviews.title: You'd have to be drunk everyday to give this hotel a high rating!!

reviews.text: This was my first time in Punta Cana but since this review is to rate the hotel, I think that I am a good candidate because I have stayed in many hotels across Canada.
reviews.title: Best vacation ever!!!

reviews.text: Before leaving I read a lot of the reviews and like one person had said I kept an open mind.
reviews.title: Clean and well placed resort but lacking in some areas

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I travelled with my girlfriend and we were looking forward to our vacation. When we arrived at the airport, we got our luggage very fast then we were helped to find our tour rep and were told to go to our bus. We arrived at the hotel and were greeted with refreshments. We then went to check in and it was done in seconds, they also told us about the safety box and explain how to program the lock. We were then brought to our room. When we tried to program the safe it did not work so we call and someone came to help us out.
reviews.title: Amazing Time - would go back

reviews.text: The first time my friend took a shower, the water was all over the floor but when I took mine I took the shower head off the hook and turn around so that the water would splash on the wall with the glass protecting so after that we never had any incident with water. Actually I was pretty surprised that we never ran out of hot water and the water pressure was more that adequate.
reviews.title: I was robbed in the middle of the day! The hotel security did not care!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room were nice and clean but I do agree that they are lacking lights but then again it might be a good thing as we all know that lights attracts those nasty little bugs.
reviews.title: it was not a 5 Star Resort

reviews.text: I first need to qualify that we have been to the Dominican - Punta Cana many many times since our first visit in 1986, when there was only 1 Iberostar resort and an old Club Med that everyone said was out there somewhere but you couldn't see it. There are now Hotels after Hotels for as long as you can see and there are a lot of people there now BUT the beaches are still spectacular and you can still find some great resorts at reasonable rates and have a great holiday as long as you can tolerate a lot of other guests enjoying the same.
reviews.title: Second Trip to this Resort

reviews.text: We actually had a better time at the resort this time since we understood going into the vacation that this is actually 1 large resort with 5 designated resorts sharing this one large property. 1. Premier or VIP that some refer to it as, is really not Premier in our opinion since it is the furthest from the Beach, actually at the front of the main reception buildings for Resorts 2. Bavaro on the left when facing the front & 3. Punta Cana on the right 4. Is called Esmarelda which is their Priveldge Club (highest end with controlled useage & much higher prices) and 5. Ambar - Adult Only controlled useage. We stayed at the Punta Cana - Royal Golden close to the beach and everything was very good to excellent. Food was good, everything was well mantained, rooms were good. Great resort and vacation but remember it is big and you should like walking or get used to the people transport system.
reviews.title: Our second visit to GBP Punta Cana

reviews.text: We stayed at the GBP Punta Cana Royal Golden for our second visit, this time we were in Villa 3. We flew Air Transat out of Toronto and opted to start our vacation in luxury by booking club class seats.
reviews.title: So much better than expected

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: On arrival in Punta Cana we were easily cleared through the customs and out the door easily. The Air Transat desk was easily identified and we were told which bus to board. As we were the first to board there was a little wait for the bus to fill and leave. There was some confusion there as the bus became overfull because the wedding party on the flight was given a private transfer and hadn't noticed the sign and boarded the bus. The problem was dealt with and we were off! The GBP had sent a representative to do the Royal Golden check in on the bus, we were given our forms to fill out, our bracelts and maps, but could not get our room keys as the rooms were not ready yet. We were advised to have lunch and check back which we did and our rooms were ready for us by 2 pm. We were taken to our rooms by the trolley. We had requested second floor rooms which we had, but requested adjoining rooms with our friends which we did not get, they however were in the room next to us.
reviews.title: My place of choice

reviews.text: As we had been at this resort the previous year we had a good idea of what to expect. However I noticed that there was a small tear in the bedspread, and it was showing its age. The bedding clean, the mattress firm, but we liked it. However the pillows were very small and lumpy. The shower head was totally clogged, we only had about 6 small streams of water, I called the Royal Golden Office and they had it repaired within a few hours. They actually replaced the whole head. The lighting in the bathroom is very poor, but we noticed that last year as well. As far as cleanliness, the shower stall glass was very soap scummed. The rest of the suite was kept clean. Some days our room was not cleaned until very late in the afternoon, we either arrived as they were finishing it around 4:30 or walked in to find the floor still wet and the maid in the next room. We were supposed to get nightly turn down, but didn't get it a few nights, not sure if that might have been because we retired too early. We had to ask the maid a few times for more water, but the bar fridge was restocked daily. The room had a coffee maker and I used it daily to make my coffee to take in my Bubba to the beach.
reviews.title: Never again

aka: Gran Bahia Principe Punta Cana Hotel Punta Cana
